Module dunbar.c482pa

Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddPartWindowController
    The AddPartWindowController controls the interface used to add new parts to the Inventory.
    AddProductWindowController
    The AddProductWindowController controls the interface used to add new products to the Inventory.
    MainWindowController
    The main window controller provides methods for loading and controlling the main window of the Inventory application GUI.
    ModifyPartWindowController
    The ModifyPartWindowController controls the interface used to modify existing parts in the Inventory allParts list.
    ModifyProductWindowController
    The ModifyProductWindowController controls the interface used to modify existing products.
